name: Silver Train
description: Silver Train is a hybrid of two very well-known and popular strains, Super Silver Haze and Trainwreck, that produces very resinous flowers and a sweet-spicy aroma that is similar to that of Trainwreck. Typical of many sativa-dominant strains, expect a high that is uplifting and euphoric. Â
attributes_title: Euphoric, Energetic, Happy, Aroused, Focused, Stress, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Pain, Inflammation, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
